starts.title: Both players wink at each other dramatically
Both players take off their shoes
starts.extra: Also, invent a wacky handshake with your feet

examples.title: Both players give each other a gentle high-five
examples.extra: Also, make it a lingering high-five with eye contact

examples.title: Both players hold hands for 10 seconds
examples.extra: Also, interlace fingers and sync three breaths

examples.title: Both players do ten jumping jacks together
examples.extra: High-five after each jumping jack

examples.title: Both players sniff each other's armpits
examples.extra: Take a deep inhale and describe the smell

examples.title: Both players do push-ups side by side
examples.extra: Do push-ups facing each other, close enough to touch noses

examples.title: Both players give each other awkward compliments
examples.extra: Make them overly dramatic and cheesy

examples.title: Both players admit a secret crush on someone in the room
examples.extra: Also, describe what you find attractive about them

examples.title: Both players do partner sit-ups, holding each other's wrists
examples.extra: Add a high-five at the top of each sit-up

examples.title: Whisper a secret fantasy to each other
examples.extra: Act out the fantasy with gestures only

examples.title: Roleplay a romantic restaurant scene together
examples.extra: Include feeding each other dessert

examples.title: Both players do mirror exercises - one leads, the other copies
examples.extra: Maintain eye contact throughout the exercises

examples.title: Both players try to speak in a foreign accent badly
examples.extra: Also, have a full conversation in the accent

examples.title: Both players share a mouthful of water and spit it back
examples.extra: Swirl it around before spitting

examples.title: Both players wear each other's shoes on the wrong feet
examples.extra: Also, walk around the room like that

examples.title: Both players do a silly dance with exaggerated hip movements
examples.extra: Also, maintain eye contact while dancing

examples.title: Both players sit on each other's laps and have a silly conversation
examples.extra: Also, use baby talk throughout

examples.title: Both players lick each other's ears
examples.extra: Get right inside the ear canal

examples.title: Both players briefly pull up their shirts for the other to see
examples.extra: Both players flash the whole group

examples.title: Both players do partner push-ups - one on top of the other
examples.extra: The top player must maintain contact with the bottom player's back

examples.title: Both players lick each other's sweaty backs
examples.extra: After doing some exercise

examples.title: The larger player pins the smaller player to the floor in a wrestling hold
examples.extra: Maintain the pin for thirty seconds

examples.title: Both players moon each other
examples.extra: Moon the whole group

examples.title: The larger player holds the smaller player against a wall in a standing embrace
examples.extra: Lift the smaller player's legs off the ground

examples.title: Current player will do an awkward lap dance for dare acceptor
examples.extra: Add guided touching

examples.title: Both players flash their genitals to each other
examples.extra: Flash the whole group

examples.title: From the knee, move your hand incrementally more intimate, asking "Nervous?" until they say yes.
examples.extra: Use your lips instead of your hand
